author: Azi Paybarah
title: Putin’s critics call for boycotts of Russian vodka.

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine was more targeted with his announcement.
author: Jordan Valinsky
title: States want to boycott Russian vodka. Here's why that won't work

sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine ordered the state’s commerce department to boycott all vodka made by Russian Standard, also hitting sales of Green Mark Vodka.
author: Angus Whitley - Bloomberg News
title: Russian vodka boycott goes global to punish Putin for war
